branch.msg:
Invalid IF condition: Evaluating expression 'dev == "prod"' failed: NameError: name 'dev' is not defined nor importable as module
Variables in the original expression '${Env} == "prod"' were resolved before the expression was evaluated. Try using '$Env == "prod"' syntax to avoid that. See Evaluating Expressions appendix in Robot Framework User Guide for more details.

test.status:
Invalid IF condition: Evaluating expression 'dev == "prod"' failed: NameError: name 'dev' is not defined nor importable as module
Variables in the original expression '${Env} == "prod"' were resolved before the expression was evaluated. Try using '$Env == "prod"' syntax to avoid that. See Evaluating Expressions appendix in Robot Framework User Guide for more details.
